page.title: 09School Sports
page.content:
At our school on a Thursday is swimming. Before we go we do a bit of work. We are allowed to take something to eat on the way back, like a packet of crisps. We have to go out of the area by bus to get to the swimming pool. We have a lesson with Mrs Bunston. It costs 35p to go. We do breast stroke, front crawl, back stroke, butterfly, side stroke. There is a diving pool and an ordinary one. You can do a sitting down dive but if you go wrong with a dive you call it a belly flop. Belly flops hurt your tummy. For swimming if you cannot swim very well you can wear arm bands and a rubber ring.
NETBALL is a game usually played by girls but at our school the boys help us play. The Centre throws out the ball to Wing Attack or Wing Defence
